tweets.text: @Shrop_Allotment @AnglingTrust @stwater @WestMidsFire Hi there. We've spoke to the @EnvAgencyMids who have confirmed that they continue to monitor water quality. They also advise water companies when there is an incident but have found no levels of pollution that cause concern.
